trans-unit.source: Installing the Workflow Accelerator Mail Relay

seg-source.mrk: Installing the Workflow Accelerator Mail Relay

target.mrk: Workflow Accelerator Mail Relay installieren

trans-unit.source: You only need to install and configure the Mail Relay if you purchased a version of Workflow Accelerator which allows you to use email triggers.

seg-source.mrk: You only need to install and configure the Mail Relay if you purchased a version of Workflow Accelerator which allows you to use email triggers.

target.mrk: Sie müssen das Mail Relay nur installieren und konfigurieren, wenn Sie eine Version von Workflow Accelerator erworben haben, welche die Verwendung des E-Mail-Auslösers erlaubt.

trans-unit.source: The mail relay is a SMTP server which receives emails and forwards them via HTTP to the Workflow Accelerator web application. It is required in order to start a workflow by email. If you don't plan on starting workflows by email, you don't have to set this component up and can skip this section.

seg-source.mrk: The mail relay is a SMTP server which receives emails and forwards them via HTTP to the Workflow Accelerator web application.
It is required in order to start a workflow by email.
If you don't plan on starting workflows by email, you don't have to set this component up and can skip this section.

target.mrk: Das Mail Relay ist ein SMTP-Server, der E-Mails per HTTP an die Workflow Accelerator-Webanwendung weiterleitet.
Es wird benötigt, um Workflows per E-Mail zu starten.
Sollten Sie nicht vorhaben, Workflows per E-Mail zu starten, dann müssen Sie diese Komponente nicht aufsetzen und können diesen Abschnitt überspringen.

trans-unit.source: The complete set-up of the mail relay consists of the following steps:

seg-source.mrk: The complete set-up of the mail relay consists of the following steps:

target.mrk: Das komplette Setup des Mail Relay umfasst folgende Schritte:

trans-unit.source: Create an email domain for the mail relay

seg-source.mrk: Create an email domain for the mail relay

target.mrk: Eine E-Mail-Domain für das Mail Relay anlegen

trans-unit.source: Install and configure the mail relay

seg-source.mrk: Install and configure the mail relay

target.mrk: Das Mail Relay installieren und konfigurieren

trans-unit.source: Configure the web application

seg-source.mrk: Configure the web application

target.mrk: Die Webanwendung konfigurieren

trans-unit.source: Create an email domain for the mail relay

seg-source.mrk: Create an email domain for the mail relay

target.mrk: Eine E-Mail-Domain für das Mail Relay anlegen

trans-unit.source: In order to work properly, the mail relay needs to receive all relevant emails. The used email addresses are created dynamically based on the ID of the workflow that should be started. The domain used for the email addresses can be chosen by you and has to be configured in the system. We advise that you create a specific subdomain which is different from your normal email domain and redirect any incoming emails to the mail relay.

seg-source.mrk: In order to work properly, the mail relay needs to receive all relevant emails.
The used email addresses are created dynamically based on the ID of the workflow that should be started.
The domain used for the email addresses can be chosen by you and has to be configured in the system.
We advise that you create a specific subdomain which is different from your normal email domain and redirect any incoming emails to the mail relay.

target.mrk: Damit das Mail Relay wie erwartet funktioniert, muss es alle relevanten E-Mails empfangen.
Die genutzten E-Mail-Adressen werden dynamisch erzeugt, basierend auf der ID des zu startenden Workflows.
Die Domain, die für die E-Mail-Adressen genutzt wird, kann von Ihnen frei gewählt und muss im System konfiguriert werden.
Wir raten dazu eine gesondert Subdomain anzulegen, die sich von Ihrer normalen E-Mail-Domain unterscheidet und dann entsprechend alle eingehenden E-Mails für diese Domain an das Mail Relay zu leiten.

trans-unit.source: For example if you use the email domain <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">mail.yourcompany.com</kbd>, a typical email address for the workflow system would look like this:

seg-source.mrk: For example if you use the email domain <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">mail.yourcompany.com</kbd>, a typical email address for the workflow system would look like this:

target.mrk: Wenn Sie z.B. die E-Mail-Domain <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">mail.yourcompany.com</kbd> verwenden, würde eine typische E-Mail-Adresse des Workflow-Systems wie folgt aussehen:

trans-unit.source: How you route the emails to the mail relay is up to you and depends on your infrastructure. If the server which runs the mail relay is publicly available, you can simply set up a respective MX record . Note, the mail relay and the Workflow Accelerator web application don't have to run on the same server. If your email server (e.g. Microsoft Exchange) allows rerouting traffic for a specific subdomain to another server, you can also set up a respective rule there. Make sure the email text and sender address have not been modified due to some forwarding mechanism.

seg-source.mrk: How you route the emails to the mail relay is up to you and depends on your infrastructure.
If the server which runs the mail relay is publicly available, you can simply set up a respective MX record .
Note, the mail relay and the Workflow Accelerator web application don't have to run on the same server.
If your email server (e.g. Microsoft Exchange) allows rerouting traffic for a specific subdomain to another server, you can also set up a respective rule there.
Make sure the email text and sender address have not been modified due to some forwarding mechanism.

target.mrk: Wie Sie die E-Mails zum Mail Relay leiten, ist Ihnen überlassen und hängt stark von Ihrer Infrastruktur ab.
Wenn z.B. der Server, auf dem das Mail Relay ausgeführt wird, öffentlich verfügbar ist, können Sie einfach einen entsprechenden MX-Record aufsetzen.
Das Mail Relay und die Workflow Accelerator-Webanwendung müssen nicht auf dem gleichen Server ausgeführt werden.
Wenn Ihr E-Mail-Server (z.B. Microsoft Exchange) das Umleiten von E-Mails für spezielle Subdomains zu anderen Servern erlaubt, dann können Sie auch dort eine entsprechende Regel einrichten.
Stellen Sie sicher, dass die E-Mail dabei nicht verändert wird und z.B. auch der ursprüngliche Absender erhalten bleibt und nicht durch die Weiterleitung verändert wird.

trans-unit.source: The next subsection explains how you set up the mail relay and configure it to use your email domain.

seg-source.mrk: The next subsection explains how you set up the mail relay and configure it to use your email domain.

target.mrk: Der nächste Abschnitt erklärt, wie Sie das Mail Relay aufsetzen und Ihre E-Mail-Domain hinein konfigurieren.

trans-unit.source: Install and configure the mail relay

seg-source.mrk: Install and configure the mail relay

target.mrk: Das Mail Relay installieren und konfigurieren

trans-unit.source: The mail relay comes as a JAR file which requires Java 8 for the execution. Make sure Java 8 is installed before continuing with the set-up.

seg-source.mrk: The mail relay comes as a JAR file which requires Java 8 for the execution.
Make sure Java 8 is installed before continuing with the set-up.

target.mrk: Das Mail Relay wird als JAR-Datei ausgeliefert und erfordert Java 8 für die Ausführung.
Stellen Sie sicher, dass Java 8 installiert ist, bevor sie mit dem Setup fortfahren.

trans-unit.source: The mail relay can be installed on the same server as the Workflow Accelerator web application or on a different server. If you choose two different servers, ensure the mail relay is able to reach the server which runs the web application.

seg-source.mrk: The mail relay can be installed on the same server as the Workflow Accelerator web application or on a different server.
If you choose two different servers, ensure the mail relay is able to reach the server which runs the web application.

target.mrk: Das Mail Relay kann auf dem gleichen Server installiert werden wie die Workflow Accelerator-Webanwendung.
Sie können aber auch beide Komponenten auf unterschiedlichen Servern installieren. Stellen Sie jedoch sicher, dass das Mail Relay eine Verbindung zu der Webanwendung herstellen kann.

trans-unit.source:
Create a new local directory for the mail relay,
e.g. C:\Program Files\Mail Relay or /var/lib/mail-relay.
  • We will refer to this directory as $MAIL_RELAY_HOME.

seg-source.mrk: Create a new local directory for the mail relay, <br xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" />
e.g. <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">C:\Program Files\Mail Relay</kbd> or <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">/var/lib/mail-relay</kbd>.
<ul xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml"><li> We will refer to this directory as <kbd>$MAIL_RELAY_HOME</kbd>.

target.mrk: Legen Sie ein neues lokales Verzeichnis für das Mail Relay an, <br xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" />
z.B. <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">C:\Program Files\Mail Relay</kbd> oder <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">/var/lib/mail-relay</kbd>.
<ul xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml"><li>Im folgenden wird dieses Verzeichnis als <kbd>$SCRIPT_ENGINE_HOME</kbd> referenziert.

trans-unit.source:
Copy the contents of the directory $WORKFLOW_HOME/mail-relay/ to your newly created directory.
  • You should find the file mail-relay.jar directly within your directory: $MAIL_RELAY_HOME/mail-relay.jar

seg-source.mrk: Copy the contents of the directory <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">$WORKFLOW_HOME/mail-relay/</kbd> to your newly created directory.
You should find the file <kbd>mail-relay.jar</kbd> directly within your directory: <kbd>$MAIL_RELAY_HOME/mail-relay.jar</kbd>

target.mrk: Kopieren Sie den Inhalt des Verzeichnisses <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">$WORKFLOW_HOME/mail-relay/</kbd> in Ihr neu angelegtes Verzeichnis.
Die Datei <kbd>mail-relay.jar</kbd> sollte sich direkt in Ihrem Verzeichnis befinden: <kbd>$MAIL_RELAY_HOME/server.js</kbd>.

trans-unit.source: Within the <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">$MAIL_RELAY_HOME</kbd> directory create a new directory <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">logs</kbd>

seg-source.mrk: Within the <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">$MAIL_RELAY_HOME</kbd> directory create a new directory <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">logs</kbd>

target.mrk: Legen Sie innerhalb des Verzeichnisses <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">$MAIL_RELAY_HOME</kbd> ein neues Verzeichnis <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">logs</kbd> an.

trans-unit.source: Open <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">$MAIL_RELAY_HOME/logback.xml</kbd> and edit <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">value</kbd> in the following line:

seg-source.mrk: Open <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">$MAIL_RELAY_HOME/logback.xml</kbd> and edit <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">value</kbd> in the following line:

target.mrk: Öffnen Sie <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">$MAIL_RELAY_HOME/logback.xml</kbd> und ändern Sie den Eintrag <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">value</kbd> in der folgenden Zeile:

trans-unit.source:
Set value to the absolute path of $MAIL_RELAY_HOME/logs.
  • For example C:\\Program Files\\Mail Relay\\logs or /var/lib/mail-relay/logs
  • On Windows you have to use \\ as a separator for the path.

seg-source.mrk: Set <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">value</kbd> to the absolute path of <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">$MAIL_RELAY_HOME/logs</kbd>.
• For example C:\\Program Files\\Mail Relay\\logs or /var/lib/mail-relay/logs
<li> On Windows you have to use <kbd>\\</kbd> as a separator for the path.

target.mrk: Setzen Sie den Wert von <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">value</kbd> auf den absoluten Dateipfad von <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">$MAIL_RELAY_HOME/logs</kbd>.
• Zum Besipiel C:\\Program Files\\Mail Relay\\logs oder /var/lib/mail-relay/logs
<li> Unter Windows müssen Sie <kbd>\\</kbd> als Trennzeichen für den Pfad nutzen.

trans-unit.source: Next, edit the configuration file.

seg-source.mrk: Next, edit the configuration file.

target.mrk: Bearbeiten Sie jetzt die Konfigurationsdatei.

trans-unit.source:
Open $MAIL_RELAY_HOME/mail-relay.properties and edit the values for the domain, port and Workflow Accelerator URL.
  • Ensure that the port for the mail relay is not used by any other application.

seg-source.mrk: Open <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">$MAIL_RELAY_HOME/mail-relay.properties</kbd> and edit the values for the domain, port and Workflow Accelerator URL.
<ul xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml"><li> Ensure that the port for the mail relay is not used by any other application.

target.mrk: Öffnen Sie <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">$MAIL_RELAY_HOME/mail-relay.properties</kbd> und passen Sie die Werte für die Domain, den Port und die Workflow Accelerator URL an.
<ul xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml"><li> Stellen Sie sicher, dass der Port für das Mail Relay nicht bereits von einer anderen Anwendung genutzt wird.

trans-unit.source: The configuration file offers the following options:

seg-source.mrk: The configuration file offers the following options:

target.mrk: Die Konfigurationsdatei bietet die folgenden Optionen:

trans-unit.source: workflow.relay.domain

seg-source.mrk: workflow.relay.domain

target.mrk: workflow.relay.domain

trans-unit.source: Defines the (sub)domain which is used to receive emails for Workflow Accelerator.

seg-source.mrk: Defines the (sub)domain which is used to receive emails for Workflow Accelerator.

target.mrk: Definiert die (Sub-)Domain, welche für den Empfang von E-Mails für Workflow Accelerator genutzt wird.

trans-unit.source: workflow.relay.port

seg-source.mrk: workflow.relay.port

target.mrk: workflow.relay.port

trans-unit.source: Defines the port the SMTP will use and listen to.

seg-source.mrk: Defines the port the SMTP will use and listen to.

target.mrk: Legt den Port fest, welchen der SMTP-Server verwenden wird.

trans-unit.source: workflow.relay.serverUrl

seg-source.mrk: workflow.relay.serverUrl

target.mrk: workflow.relay.serverUrl

trans-unit.source: Defines the URL of the Workflow Accelerator web application.

seg-source.mrk: Defines the URL of the Workflow Accelerator web application.

target.mrk: Legt die URL der Workflow Accelerator Webanwendung fest.

trans-unit.source: After the successful set-up you can start the mail relay by opening the command line and executing the following command :

seg-source.mrk: After the successful set-up you can start the mail relay by opening the command line and executing the following command :

target.mrk: Nach der erfolgreichen Installation können Sie das Mail Relay starten, in dem Sie die Kommandozeile öffnen und folgenden Befehl ausführen:

trans-unit.source: Replace <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">$MAIL_RELAY_HOME</kbd> with the absolute path to the JAR file.

seg-source.mrk: Replace <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">$MAIL_RELAY_HOME</kbd> with the absolute path to the JAR file.

target.mrk: Ersetzen Sie <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">$MAIL_RELAY_HOME</kbd> mit dem absoluten Dateipfad zu der JAR-Datei.

trans-unit.source: You can also register a new service or set up a new Linux Init script depending on your operating system to ease the management of the mail relay.

seg-source.mrk: You can also register a new service or set up a new Linux Init script depending on your operating system to ease the management of the mail relay.

target.mrk: Um das Management vom Mail Relay zu vereinfachen, können Sie auch einen entsprechenden Service registrieren oder ein Linux-Init-Skript aufsetzen, abhängig von Ihrem Betriebssystem.

trans-unit.source: Windows

seg-source.mrk: Windows

target.mrk: Windows

trans-unit.source: Section <MadCap:xref href="install-script-engine.htm#Wrapping" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">Wrapping the Script Engine into a service </MadCap:xref> explains how you can wrap a single command into a service using NSSM. If you installed NSSM previously, you don't need to install it again. Simply follow the instructions and replace the details for the script engine with the details for the mail relay:

seg-source.mrk: Section <MadCap:xref href="install-script-engine.htm#Wrapping" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">Wrapping the Script Engine into a service </MadCap:xref> explains how you can wrap a single command into a service using NSSM.
If you installed NSSM previously, you don't need to install it again.
Simply follow the instructions and replace the details for the script engine with the details for the mail relay:

target.mrk: Abschnitt <MadCap:xref href="install-script-engine.htm#Wrapping" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">Wrapping the Script Engine into a service </MadCap:xref> erklärt, wie Sie einen einzelnen Befehl unter Verwendung von NSSM als Service registrieren können.
Wenn Sie bereits NSSM installiert haben, dann müssen Sie dies nicht erneut tun.
Folgen Sie den Anweisungen in dem Abschnitt und ersetzen Sie die Details für die Script Engine mit den Details für das Mail Relay.

trans-unit.source: Open a command line with administrator privileges and execute:

seg-source.mrk: Open a command line with administrator privileges and execute:

target.mrk: Öffnen Sie die Kommandozeile mit Administratorrechten und führen Sie folgenden Befehl aus:

trans-unit.source: In the Application tab fill in the following information:

seg-source.mrk: In the Application tab fill in the following information:

target.mrk: Im Tab Application fügen Sie folgende Informationen hinzu:

trans-unit.source: Path

seg-source.mrk: Path

target.mrk: Path

trans-unit.source: the path to the Java .exe file, e.g. <br xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" /><kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">C:\Program Files\Java\jre1.8.0_92\bin\java.exe</kbd>

seg-source.mrk: the path to the Java .exe file, e.g. <br xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" /><kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">C:\Program Files\Java\jre1.8.0_92\bin\java.exe</kbd>

target.mrk: der Pfad zur Java .exe Datei, z.B. <br xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" /><kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">C:\\Program Files\\Java\\jre1.8.0_92\\bin\\java.exe</kbd>

trans-unit.source: Startup directory

seg-source.mrk: Startup directory

target.mrk: Startup directory

trans-unit.source: the value of<kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">$MAIL_RELAY_HOME</kbd>, e.g.<kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">C:\Program Files\Mail Relay</kbd>.

seg-source.mrk: the value of<kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">$MAIL_RELAY_HOME</kbd>, e.g.
<kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">C:\Program Files\Mail Relay</kbd>.

target.mrk: das richtige Verzeichnis von <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">$MAIL_RELAY_HOME</kbd>, z. B.:
<kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">C:\Program Files\Mail Relay</kbd>.

trans-unit.source: Arguments

seg-source.mrk: Arguments

target.mrk: Arguments

trans-unit.source: the exact value <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">-jar mail-relay.jar</kbd>

seg-source.mrk: the exact value <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">-jar mail-relay.jar</kbd>

target.mrk: der genaue Wert <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">-jar mail-relay.jar</kbd>

trans-unit.source:
In the Details tab fill in the following information:
Display name the name of the service shown in services.msc
Description a description which will help you to recognize the service
Startup type choose if the service shall start automatically on startup or if you want to start it manually

seg-source.mrk:
In the Details tab fill in the following information:
Display name the name of the service shown in services.msc
Description a description which will help you to recognize the service
Startup type choose if the service shall start automatically on startup or if you want to start it manually

alt-trans.seg-source:
Display name the name of the service shown in services.msc
Description a description which will help you to recognize the service
Startup type choose if the service shall start automatically on startup or if you want to start it manually
alt-trans.target:
Display name der Name des Service, welcher inservices.msc angezeigt wird
Description eine Beschreibung, die Ihnen dabei hilft den Service wiederzuerkennen
Startup type wählen Sie ob der Service automatisch beim Systemstart oder manuell gestartet werden soll

trans-unit.source: After the successful registration, you can start the mail relay similarly to the script engine either on command line or via <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">services.msc</kbd>.

seg-source.mrk: After the successful registration, you can start the mail relay similarly to the script engine either on command line or via <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">services.msc</kbd>.

target.mrk: Nach der erfolgreichen Registrierung können Sie das Mail Relay ähnlich wie die Script Engine entweder per Kommandozeile oder via <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">services.msc</kbd> starten.

trans-unit.source: Linux

seg-source.mrk: Linux

target.mrk: Linux

trans-unit.source: Similar to the script engine, for the mail relay this task is usually accomplished with Init scripts using the respective Init system of your Linux distribution. Because there are several different Init systems, Signavio will not provide a template. However, if you don't already have a template, you can find lots of matching templates for your Init system on the internet.

seg-source.mrk: Similar to the script engine, for the mail relay this task is usually accomplished with Init scripts using the respective Init system of your Linux distribution.
Because there are several different Init systems, Signavio will not provide a template.
However, if you don't already have a template, you can find lots of matching templates for your Init system on the internet.

target.mrk: Vergleichbar mit der Script Engine, wird diese Aufgabe meist mit Hilfe von Init-Skripten für das jeweilige Init-System Ihrer Linux-Distribution umgesetzt.
Da es mehrere verschiedene Init-Systeme gibt, stellt Signavio kein Template für ein entsprechendes Skript zur Verfügung.
Für den Fall, dass Sie noch kein Template haben, finden Sie im Internet zahlreiche Beispiele für die verschiedenen Init-Systeme.

trans-unit.source: As mentioned before, the mail relay can be started by executing:

seg-source.mrk: As mentioned before, the mail relay can be started by executing:

target.mrk: Wie bereits erwähnt, kann das Mail Relay mit folgendem Befehl gestartet werden:

trans-unit.source: The placeholder <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">$MAIL_RELAY_HOME</kbd> has to be replaced with the absolute path to the JAR file.

seg-source.mrk: The placeholder <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">$MAIL_RELAY_HOME</kbd> has to be replaced with the absolute path to the JAR file.

target.mrk: Der Platzhalter <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">$MAIL_RELAY_HOME</kbd> muss durch den absoluten Dateipfad zu der JAR-Datei ersetzt werden.

trans-unit.source: You have to ensure your Init script starts the Java executable and uses the arguments <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">-jar</kbd> and the absolute path to JAR file <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">mail-relay.jar</kbd>. Note that if you use a restricted user to execute the command, the user must have appropriate access to the <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">$MAIL_RELAY_HOME</kbd> directory.

seg-source.mrk: You have to ensure your Init script starts the Java executable and uses the arguments <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">-jar</kbd> and the absolute path to JAR file <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">mail-relay.jar</kbd>.
Note that if you use a restricted user to execute the command, the user must have appropriate access to the <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">$MAIL_RELAY_HOME</kbd> directory.

target.mrk: Stellen Sie sicher, dass Ihr Init-Skript Java ausführt und die Argumente <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">-jar</kbd> sowie den absoluten Dateipfad zu der JAR-Datei <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">mail-relay.jar</kbd> verwendet.

Wenn Sie für das Skript einen Nutzer mit eingeschränkten Rechten verwenden, stellen Sie bitte sicher, dass dieser Zugriff auf das Verzeichnis <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">$MAIL_RELAY_HOME</kbd> hat.

trans-unit.source: Configure the web application

seg-source.mrk: Configure the web application

target.mrk: Die Webanwendung konfigurieren

trans-unit.source: After setting up the mail relay, the email trigger needs to be enabled in the web application configuration. Section <MadCap:xref href="configure.htm#UpdateWorkflowAcc" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">Update the Workflow Accelerator configuration file </MadCap:xref>explains where you find the respective configuration file. Make sure to set proper values for the following configuration values:

seg-source.mrk: After setting up the mail relay, the email trigger needs to be enabled in the web application configuration.

Section <MadCap:xref href="configure.htm#UpdateWorkflowAcc" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">Update the Workflow Accelerator configuration file </MadCap:xref>explains where you find the respective configuration file.
Make sure to set proper values for the following configuration values:

target.mrk: Nach dem Aufsetzen des Mail Relay muss der E-Mail-Auslöser in der Konfiguration der Webanwendung aktiviert werden.

Abschnitt <MadCap:xref href="configure.htm#UpdateWorkflowAcc" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">Update the Workflow Accelerator configuration file </MadCap:xref> beschreibt wo die entsprechende Konfigurationsdatei zu finden ist.
Stellen Sie sicher, dass für die folgenden Einstellungen gültige Werte konfiguriert sind:

trans-unit.source: The first value must be set to <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">true</kbd> to enable the email trigger. The second value must be set to the email domain you created for the mail relay. It will be shown in the user interface of the web application.

seg-source.mrk: The first value must be set to <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">true</kbd> to enable the email trigger.
The second value must be set to the email domain you created for the mail relay.
It will be shown in the user interface of the web application.

target.mrk: Der erste Wert muss auf <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">true</kbd> gesetzt werden, um den E-Mail-Auslöser zu aktivieren.
Für den zweiten Wert müssen Sie die E-Mail-Domain konfigurieren, die Sie für das Mail Relay angelegt haben.
Die E-Mail-Domain wird in der Nutzeroberfläche der Webanwendung angezeigt.

trans-unit.source: Testing the mail relay

seg-source.mrk: Testing the mail relay

target.mrk: Das Mail Relay testen

trans-unit.source: In order to verify the set-up works as intended, it can be helpful to test it. If you have installed Workflow Accelerator completely and created an organization within the application, you can directly test the set-up with a workflow.

seg-source.mrk: In order to verify the set-up works as intended, it can be helpful to test it.
If you have installed Workflow Accelerator completely and created an organization within the application, you can directly test the set-up with a workflow.

target.mrk: Um sicherzustellen, dass das Setup wie erwartet funktioniert, testen Sie das Setup.
Wenn Sie Workflow Accelerator komplett installiert und bereits eine Organisation in der Anwendung erstellt haben, können Sie das Setup direkt mit einem Workflow testen.

trans-unit.source: Create a new workflow

seg-source.mrk: Create a new workflow

target.mrk: Erstellen Sie einen neuen Workflow

trans-unit.source: Choose the email trigger

seg-source.mrk: Choose the email trigger

target.mrk: Wählen Sie den E-Mail-Auslöser aus

trans-unit.source: Copy the email address which is shown in the UI

seg-source.mrk: Copy the email address which is shown in the UI

target.mrk: Kopieren Sie die E-Mail-Adresse, die in der Nutzeroberfläche angezeigt wird

trans-unit.source: Publish the workflow

seg-source.mrk: Publish the workflow

target.mrk: Veröffentlichen Sie den Workflow

trans-unit.source: Send an email to the copied email address

seg-source.mrk: Send an email to the copied email address

target.mrk: Senden Sie eine E-Mail an die kopierte E-Mail-Adresse

trans-unit.source: The case list should now contain a new completed case which shows your email in the event stream. If no case was started, you should check the log file <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">$MAIL_RELAY_HOME/logs/mail.log</kbd> for any error message.

seg-source.mrk: The case list should now contain a new completed case which shows your email in the event stream.
If no case was started, you should check the log file <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">$MAIL_RELAY_HOME/logs/mail.log</kbd> for any error message.

target.mrk: In der Fallübersicht sollte nun ein neuer, bereits abgeschlossener Fall zu sehen sein. Dieser Fall enthält die Information Ihrer E-Mail im Ereignisfeed.
Wenn kein Fall gestartet wurde, dann überprüfen Sie bitte die Log-Datei <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">$MAIL_RELAY_HOME/logs/mail.log</kbd> auf Fehlernachrichten.

trans-unit.source: If you haven't finished the complete set-up, but at least the web application is running as well, you can test already whether the communication between the mail relay and the web application works. A simple way to do that is to send an email via command line to the mail relay and consult the log file to see the result from the server. The following examples will show you how you can do that on different operating systems. The examples will send an email to a not existing workflow which is referenced by <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">process-123</kbd>. Therefore, the web application will respond with an error code and you will see a message similar to <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">Invalid response status code: 400</kbd> in the log file. This error is expected, as the workflow doesn't exist, and proves the communication is working.

seg-source.mrk: If you haven't finished the complete set-up, but at least the web application is running as well, you can test already whether the communication between the mail relay and the web application works.
A simple way to do that is to send an email via command line to the mail relay and consult the log file to see the result from the server.
The following examples will show you how you can do that on different operating systems.
The examples will send an email to a not existing workflow which is referenced by <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">process-123</kbd>.
Therefore, the web application will respond with an error code and you will see a message similar to <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">Invalid response status code: 400</kbd> in the log file.
This error is expected, as the workflow doesn't exist, and proves the communication is working.

target.mrk: Wenn Sie das Setup noch nicht komplett abgeschlossen haben, aber die Webanwendung aufgesetzt ist, können Sie bereits testen, ob die Kommunikation zwischen Mail Relay und Webanwendung funktioniert.
Dies können Sie tun, indem Sie eine E-Mail per Kommandozeile versenden und anschließend die Log-Datei des Mail Relay überprüfen, um die Antwort des Servers zu sehen.
Die folgenden Beispiele zeigen Ihnen, wie Sie dies mit verschiedenen Betriebssystemen tun können.
Die Beispiele werden eine E-Mail an einen nicht existierenden Workflow senden, welcher als <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">process-123</kbd> referenziert wird.
Dementsprechend wird die Webanwendung mit einem Fehlercode antworten, welchen Sie in der Log-Datei finden: <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">Invalid response status code: 400</kbd>.
Dieser Fehler wird erwartet, da der Workflow nicht existiert und beweist, dass die Kommunikation funktioniert.

trans-unit.source: Windows

seg-source.mrk: Windows

target.mrk: Windows

trans-unit.source: You can send an email using the Windows PowerShell:>

seg-source.mrk: You can send an email using the Windows PowerShell:>

target.mrk: Sie können eine E-Mail mit der Windows PowerShell wie folgt versenden:

trans-unit.source: Replace the domain of the email address for the <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">-To</kbd> parameter with the one you set in the configuration file.

seg-source.mrk: Replace the domain of the email address for the <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">-To</kbd> parameter with the one you set in the configuration file.

target.mrk: Ersetzen Sie die Domain der E-Mail-Adresse des <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">-To</kbd> Parameters mit der Domain, die Sie in der Konfigurationsdatei eingetragen haben.

trans-unit.source: Linux

seg-source.mrk: Linux

target.mrk: Linux

trans-unit.source: You can send an email using telnet to connect to the mail relay.

seg-source.mrk: You can send an email using telnet to connect to the mail relay.

target.mrk: Sie können eine E-Mail versenden, indem Sie sich per telnet mit dem Mail Relay verbinden.

trans-unit.source: Open a command line on the server which is running the mail relay and execute:

seg-source.mrk: Open a command line on the server which is running the mail relay and execute:

target.mrk: Öffnen Sie die Kommandozeile auf dem Server, auf dem das Mail Relay ausgeführt wird und führen Sie folgenden Befehl aus:

trans-unit.source: Replace the number <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">25</kbd> with the respective port that you configured for the mail relay.

seg-source.mrk: Replace the number <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">25</kbd> with the respective port that you configured for the mail relay.

target.mrk: Ersetzen Sie die Nummer <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">25</kbd> mit dem entsprechenden Port, den Sie bei der Konfiguration des Mail Relay festgelegt haben.

trans-unit.source: Afterwards type in the following example line by line and replace the domain in the email for <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">rcpt to</kbd> to match the domain you configured for the mail relay.

seg-source.mrk: Afterwards type in the following example line by line and replace the domain in the email for <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">rcpt to</kbd> to match the domain you configured for the mail relay.

target.mrk: Tippen Sie anschliessend folgendes Beispiel Zeile für Zeile ein und ersetzen Sie dabei die Domain der E-Mail unter <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">rcpt to</kbd> mit dem von Ihnen konfigurierten Wert für das Mail Relay.
